description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Historical Collections of the Great West; containing narrations of the most important ... events in Western History, remarkable individual adventures, sketches of frontier life, descriptions of natural curiosities ... Historical and descriptive sketches of Oregon, New Mexico, Texas, Minnesota, Utah and California" Author: HOWE, Henry. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 9603.d.4." Page: 71 Place of Publishing: Cincinnati Date of Publishing: 1851 Issuance: monographic Identifier: 001748052 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
